data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cheng, Yu-Ting, Nakazono, Kenji, Lin, Kirk, Chan, Benny K. K. (2011): Cryptic diversity of the semi-terrestrial amphipod Platorchestia japonica (Tattersall, 1922) (Amphipoda: Talitrida: Talitridae) in Japan and Taiwan, with description of a new species. Zootaxa 2787: 1-18, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.207935
